You are right, but Genshin Impact is a new open world adventure game independently developed by Miyou. The game takes place in a fantasy world called 'Tivat', where the chosen person is granted the 'Eye of God' to guide the power of the elements. You will play a mysterious role called "Traveler", who will meet friends with different personalities and unique abilities in the free travel, defeat strong enemies with them, and find lost relatives - at the same time, gradually discover the truth of "Genshin Impact".

什么？这不是守望先锋2啊🙌，这是暴雪木琴的古灰盒，体积小方便携带👍，拆开一包✋😀，放水里就散开，怎么找都找不回来，用来泡水😋😋，冲厕所，拖地都是很好用的😋😋，你看打开以后像奶茶粉一样碎👍✋，放在水里遇水溶解不见，溶解性很强的。冲开以后，是一杯强效加量的洁厕灵，你看它怎么用都用不完👍👍，不掉伤手不伤地，使用一辈子都没问题，大扫除带上它非常方便，用它洗袜子，再拖地板，冲厕所，干净卫生。什么?在哪里买?👆👆右上角寿衣商店，买一盒送一盒😋😋😋😋😋😋

英雄平衡一坨大便，枪声改的狗屎一坨，UI设计更是重量级，画饼画了这么多年的PVE自己阉割了，完事这还要付费游玩，我寻思这DLC也不行啊，要机制没机制，怪物也是没有特点就是给你堆怪就是给你堆血。明明有1珠玉在前，只需要你正常更新就行，暴雪偏要证明自己有把蛋糕做成狗屎的能力。天天逮着个逼联赛做平衡，这下好了，联赛也快没了，游戏还能活多久呢。

Overwatch 1.5 is Blizzard's grand attempt at dressing up a dead horse to make more money.
Overwatch 1 went nearly 2 years without a major content update so that Overwatch 1.5 could release with less content than what would probably be released in the patches during that time anyway. Probably because the majority of that development time was spent creating an overwhelming amount of overpriced cosmetics that could be rolled out over the year. 
Why is it Overwatch 1.5 instead of Overwatch 2? Because if you played Overwatch 1, you'd know this is barely worth being called a sequel. This entire game was made so they could revamp monetization so it could be even more predatory. Loot boxes weren't enough? We'll add battle passes! $20 skins! Rotating shop just like Fortnite does! Clearly Blizzard wasn't content demanding $60 every event to avoid FOMO so they took it a step further and made it even worse.
You don't even get all the characters anymore, at least if you didn't purchase Overwatch 1 originally. The new characters can take nearly 40 hours of gameplay just to get if you aren't willing to drop $15 on every single battle pass they release. In a game where a critical part of it is swapping characters and countering picks, you have to purchase them. This is not a game where you spam a character every match because you pick it in the lobby, you're free to swap whenever, it's an encouraged part of the gameplay. So why limit it? Just to force people to spend even more?
Blizzard is a pathetic company. A complete shell of its former self. Greed has completely ruined what once was a paragon in the gaming industry. Fuck Bobby Kotick, fuck Activision, and fuck this new age game design where everything is designed to last forever, suck up every waking moment of your life, and drain every fucking dollar from your wallet.

开始玩守望比入坑steam还早，没想到沦落到这个地步，最开始是守望教导了我买断制，结果游戏没了，国区号没了，呵呵。说点不成熟的话，谁不想自己玩的游戏有点口碑呢？热度不高，国区是这样的，国外还行。更新摆烂，没关系，底子好经的起耗。玩啊玩啊玩近六年，这个sb，看着别人玩lol的摇人一呼百应，说不出滋味，在各个游戏里流浪，桌面永远留着的是守望，傍晚起去图书馆学习，也要电脑挂着联赛直播再离开，本来没什么精力了，还是带着账号和先行者礼包去迎接新时代，得到的是什么？体验下降，风评下降，三个赛季不到暴毙，画的大饼子虚乌有，联赛被重创.......游戏没了，真的应激产生空虚感， 有考虑转战亚服啊，但我舍不得我的数据，一堆节日皮活动皮表情特写重新买，要在游戏里打工要多久？更不要说七八个联赛金皮一堆金武，能保住自己三分地，再转生也回不到这个高度了，押宝半年赌一个回归，什么嘲笑什么冷眼接了认了。结果是tm渐行渐远？亚服肆意针对性封禁新号，上steam一开始不支持简中，连个购买dlc都能出问题，真当玩家是牛羊？吃相这么难看？逆天的管理层，商战打的一手好牌，运营却是满地稀碎，还以为暴雪是天龙人剧本呢？犯贱逼反一个大区玩家？烧掉十多年本土积累？连风向标的联赛都不再扶持重振，我已经抱着悲观的态度预示这个游戏的萎靡，给你们这群渣子的利益让道，真的是吸血鬼啊，双亲化炭的存在

I've been an Overwatch player since it came out in 2016, I have over 1000 hours and I enjoyed every single moment in Overwatch 1. It had a world that was extremely interesting, almost every character had great lore, an interesting backstory, and very fun and thoughtful gameplay, the gameplay as a whole was extremely polished and enjoyable, the events were fun and the loot boxes, albeit some people complained about not being able to get what they wanted out of them, were fair because you pretty much got one for every hour of playing the game, meaning you were never forced to buy them. Overwatch 1 was very good in its first years, however, when Overwatch 2 was announced, the devs abandoned Overwatch 1 FOR THREE WHOLE YEARS, everybody was fine with this because with Overwatch 2 Blizzard teased a huge PVE Campaign, with a full fledged story, missions and talent trees for every hero in the game (overall the whole point of why Overwatch 2 even exists), everything was very promising until they started to underdeliver on their promises, Blizzard released Overwatch 2 in a very lackluster state, with only the PVP portion barely changed from OW1 (Changing the team compositions from 6V6 to 5V5 and basically buffing every tank in the game) a shop full of predatory microtransactions (what was previously a free legendary skin from OW1 that you get by playing the game is now 20$) pretty much the worst execution at a battle pass I've ever seen, locking new heroes behind a paywall and no PVE in sight, overall pretty bad, but they promised that the PVE portion was still in the works, which is why I kept having faith on them. Some months ago Blizzard confirmed that PVE was no longer being worked on, essentially killing the only reason why the sequel exists, and also killing all the passion I had for this game, for its characters, and its universe. 

Now this game is only a shell of its former self, all of the glory days of Overwatch 1 are long gone, Overwatch 2 was actually a "microtransaction update" that now only exists to suck the money out of its players that deserved way more than paying 20$ for a lazy recolor of a skin, 10$ for a shitty battle pass, and 15$ for mediocre "PVE missions" that are no way near anything they initially promised. 

Fuck Blizzard, fuck Activision, fuck Bobby Kotick and fuck corporate greed, they ruined a beautiful game full of potential. I hope they rot in hell.
